name: Entrance
contents: You are in the entrance. There's a passage to the east and the north.

name: Trap Room
contents: As you enter the room, the floor drops out from under you, revealing a pit of spikes! You plummet to your death!

name: Hallway
contents: You are in a hallway. There's a passage to the west and another to the north.

name: Antechamber
contents: You behold a grand door to the north. A hallway sits to the south.
